name: DragonWatch
description:
Ulrik and Magnus (Player 1 and Player 2) are both incredibly hungry.... FOR BLOOD!... and also the delicious food surrounding them. They must face off in a battle to the death to determine who is King of the Condiments! But watch out, the delicious food in each level creates some deliciously dangerous hazards....

This game is best played with two controllers!

Downloadable to Windows & Mac

CONTROLLER CONTROLS:

left stick = move

right stick = look

A button = jump

B button = punch

KEYBOARD CONTROLS (Player 1 only):

WASD = move

mouse movement = look

left control = jump

left shift = punch

MEET THE DESIGN TEAM:

Nathan Koc (b. 1998) is an animator who was born and currently lives and works in Boston, Massachusetts but lived in Izmir, Turkey for over fifteen years. He has experience in all forms of animation, but he focuses on 2D & 3D digital animation. Interested In: Creating animations for games, UI designs, 3D modeling, Concept Art. https://www.fnathankoc.com/

Ryan Donahue is an industrial designer with experience in graphic design, product design, and game design. https://www.behance.net/ryandonahue

Taylor Dunn is a Senior in painting at Massachusetts College of Art and Design. She has experience in digital drawing, animation, traditional drawing, painting, sculpting and ceramics. She is interested in mostly digital art like portraits and figure drawings.
